activities: NationBuilder provides services to campaigns, nonprofits, business entities and individuals, including supporter and volunteer management software, bulk email, online fundraising and content management, as part of a community organizing system. NationBuilder’s services are marketed to organizations and campaigns, and NationBuilder operates as a data processor for its clients. NationBuilder does not independently control the use of personal data it processes on behalf of its clients, and acts only upon instruction in a customer service model. NationBuilder provides privacy information to the individuals and organizations responsible for providing notice to their constituents consistent with the seven principle of the Safe Harbor provisions: notice, choice, onward transfer, security, data integrity, access and enforcement.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: NationBuilder works with JAMS to resolve privacy disputes.
